item.title: Roslyn analyzers: How to
item.description: This post contains a collection of samples for writing Roslyn analyzers. It's a living document that I will update over time. Find an IMethodSymbol from a compilation var type = compilation.GetTypeByMetadataName("System.Threading.Tasks.Task") var methods = type.GetMembers("GetAwaiter").OfType(); If you want a specific method when there are multiple overloads, you can use theâ€¦ Link to article: https://www.meziantou.net/roslyn-analyzers-how-to.htm?utm_medium=social&utm_source=syndication
